publisher.publisher-name: A. V. Ebersole, Jr. / Romance Languages, University of N. Carolina

title-group.article-title: FIGURACIÓN LÍRICA Y LÚDICA: EL ROMANCE "HORTELANO ERA BELARDO" DE LOPE DE VEGA
